name: propose-times
title: Propose Times
description: Generate meeting time proposals from your SavvyCal availability
author: ben

commands.name: propose-times
commands.title: Propose Times
commands.description: Generate a message with your available meeting times

preferences.name: savvycalToken
preferences.title: SavvyCal API Token
preferences.description: Your SavvyCal Personal Access Token (starts with pt_secret_)

preferences.name: savvycalLink
preferences.title: SavvyCal Link Slug
preferences.description: The slug from your SavvyCal URL (e.g., 'chat' from savvycal.com/skinnyandbald/chat)

preferences.name: defaultTimezone
preferences.title: Default Recipient Timezone
preferences.description: Default timezone for the person you're proposing times to

preferences.name: defaultDaysAhead
preferences.title: Default Days Ahead
preferences.description: Default number of days to look ahead for availability

preferences.name: bookerUrl
preferences.title: Booker URL
preferences.description: URL of your savvycal-booker Vercel deployment (enables one-click booking). Leave empty to link directly to SavvyCal.
